segments.text: Are you sure you ’ re alright . You look a bit worry today ? Is anything wrong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Yes . There are something wrong actually . Perhaps you can give me some advice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , Last night when I returned from thetheatre I found I lost my wallet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . That ’ s terrible . What was in your wallet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , some money of course , a vise , all my identity cards and some photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , If I were you , I would go to the police station straight away and calling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have already done that and they already look for it . I ’ ll leaving soon and I need my vise and identity cards badly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . What a pity . Are you sure you lost your wallet in theatre ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you should put an advertisement in china daily . Things where you lasted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute , My uncle lives in Beijing and he lives very close to theatre . I ’ Ve telephone here and ask him to go to theatre to require it . We ’ d better have breakfast now . and meet him later .
segments.speaker: S1
